about_the_game:
For everything there is a season, and for every season there's Solitaire! Spring into summer and fall into winter with your favorite card game. Play more than 1000 levels across 10 locations in any season. Explore solitaire classics alongside innovative new variations, such as Whitmore, or Hornet.

Travel the world, playing each location in the current season, or choose your favorite season, with beautiful backgrounds that change as you build each location throughout the game. From a wintery mountain palace to a summery garden castle, every scene is a feast for the eyes.

Take on quests to collect decorations that bring life to each location and enhance their beauty. Harness dynamic boosters in four distinct gameplay experiences: Standard, Challenging, Relaxed, and Timed. Regardless of how you like to play, lose yourself in an enthralling gaming journey, enhanced by an alluring soundtrack and vibrant seasonal aesthetics.

Be sure to participate in the best Solitaire experience of this season and last. Shuffle your cards to victory with Jewel Match Solitaire Seasons!

- Over 1000 challenging levels!
- 6 classical Solitaire games such as Klondike, Spider or Freecell.
- 18 additional Solitaire variants including Whitmore or Hornet.
- 10 beautiful locations to build.
- Play each location in the current season, or choose any season.
- Play 4 different game modes: Normal, Hard, Relaxed and Timed.
- Play supersize, challenge, sliding and match-2 bonus levels.
- Fulfill quests.
- Select from several unique card decks to play with.
- Reveal breathtaking wallpapers for your desktop.
- Unwind with a relaxing soundtrack for every season.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or newer
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 64MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 681 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
